CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: CSW Industrials Inc is a diversified industrial growth company with well-established scalable platforms and domain expertise across three segments Contractor Solutions Engineered Building Solutions and Specialized Reliability Solutions. The companys Contractor Solutions segment involves manufacturing efficient and performance-enhancing products for residential and commercial HVAC/R and plumbing applications which are designed for professional end-use customers. Majority of the company revenue is generated from Contractor Solutions segment from US markets.
